message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SY, cs.NI 

The paper discusses the development of a novel approach to building reliable and secure distributed systems, which is a topic that falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also focuses on fault tolerance, which is a sub-topic of Computer Security and Cryptography (cs.CR). The paper presents a new protocol for state-machine replication (SMR), which is a topic that falls under the category of Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the resilience of the protocol in the face of network asynchrony, which is a topic that falls under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the performance of the protocol, which is a topic that falls under the category of Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI).
